Device.Name: NUC200SE3AN
Device.Description: NUVOTON's NUC200SE3AN operates at a maximum speed of 50MHz and features 128 Kbytes of Flash and 16 Kbytes of RAM.

Parameters.Parameters:
DMA controllers : 9 ch SPI : 2 ch UART : 2 ch I2C : 2 ch A/D converters(12bit) : 7 ch timer(32bit) : 4 ch PWM : 6 ch ISO7816-3 : 2 ch watchdog timer : Available RTC : Available ISP/ICP/IAP : Available IRC 22MHz : Available VBAT supply 22MHz : Available I/O Ports : 49 pins
